section.title: ControlDecoration
section.para: The ControlDecoration class allows you to place image decorations on SWT controls to show additional information about the control. These decorations can also have a description text which is displayed once the user places the mouse over them.
During the layout of your screen you need to make sure that enough space is available to display these decorations.
